text: Walter Pérez was a sprinter from Uruguay. Pérez competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was born on 1 November 1924 and died on 30 December 2009.Walter Pérez == References == Category:1924 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Uruguayan athletes Category:Sprinters Category:Olympians for Uruguay Category:Sportspeople from Montevideo
title: Walter Pérez
